home.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Evaluate Mining Damages
home.description: Discover the Mining Impacts Calculator, a decision making tool for valuing the damages caused by gold mining in the Amazon. Try it now!

calculator.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Online Tool
calculator.description: Calculate the social and environmental damages of gold mining in the Amazon with our valuation tool. Perform detailed analyses instantly.

about.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | About
about.description: Learn more about the Mining Impacts Calculator, a decision making tool for valuing the environmental damages caused by gold mining in the Amazon. Check it out!

usageGuide.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Step-by-Step Guide
usageGuide.description: Follow our user guide and learn how to use the Mining Impacts Calculator. Evaluate the environmental damages caused by gold mining in the Amazon. Try it now!

partnership.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Partnership with the MPF
partnership.description: Read about the partnership between CSF and the Federal Public Ministry to combat illegal gold mining with the Mining Impacts Calculator.

methodology.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Work Methodology
methodology.description: Understand the methodology behind the Mining Impacts Calculator. Learn how the environmental damage valuation for illegal gold mining is performed.

publications.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Publications
publications.description: Access articles, reports and studies related to the Mining Impacts Calculator. Explore publications on environmental damage valuation.

methodologicalReport.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Methodological Report
methodologicalReport.description: Download the complete methodological report of the Mining Impacts Calculator and understand the details of the valuations performed. Access now.

scientificArticles.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Scientific Articles
scientificArticles.description: Check out scientific articles published by the CSF team, based on the methodology behind the Mining Impacts Calculator.

caseStudies.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Case Studies
caseStudies.description: Explore case studies on the application of the Mining Impacts Calculator. Discover real-world examples of how the tool is used for environmental valuation.

team.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Meet the Team
team.description: Discover the creators, partners and sponsors behind the development of the Mining Impacts Calculator.

csfAndCreators.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | CSF and Creators
csfAndCreators.description: Meet the CSF team and creators responsible for the Mining Impacts Calculator. Discover the minds behind this environmental valuation tool.

partners.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Partners
partners.description: Learn about the strategic partnerships that strengthen the Mining Impacts Calculator, a decision making valuation tool.

sponsors.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Sponsors
sponsors.description: Meet the sponsors supporting the Mining Impacts Calculator, a decision making tool for environmental damage valuation.

press.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Press
press.description: Check out news and interviews about the Mining Impacts Calculator and its potential uses in combating illegal gold mining.

multimedia.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Media Gallery
multimedia.description: Access videos and photos related to the Mining Impacts Calculator and how it's used by various actors in the fight against illegal gold mining in the Amazon.

usageStories.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Usage Stories
usageStories.description: Explore usage stories of the Mining Impacts Calculator by different actors working to combat illegal gold mining in the Amazon.

awards.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Awards
awards.description: View the awards and recognitions earned by the Mining Impacts Calculator. Discover the impact of this valuation tool in the fight against illegal gold mining.

miningMap.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Mining Map
miningMap.description: Access the map identifying areas in the Amazon where illegal gold mining activities are taking place.

contact.title: Mining Impacts Calculator | Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the Mining Impacts Calculator team. Ask your questions and learn how to collaborate in the fight against illegal gold mining.
